Name: Greedy Guns
About the game: Greedy Guns is a joyful, color-filled platformer that sprinkles elements of exploration on top of excruciating challenges. This arcadey, twin-stick shooter rampage will leave you crying tears of joy – or defeat. Inspired by classic shooters like Gunstar Heroes, Metal Slug, and Contra, Greedy Guns brings the run-and-gun formula into the 21st Century! EXPLORE / AIM / SHOOT / SURVIVE KEY FEATURES 2 player couch co-op A sprawling, interconnected 2D world 360º aiming and shooting Metroidvania inspired gameplay Big bosses and overwhelming odds Difficulty selection Steam Trading cards Keyboard and Mouse and Controller support! STORY HOLO CORP – a ubiquitous corporate behemoth that (obviously) values profit over ethics. That's why they aren't shy about sending mercenaries to explore and preemptively attack alien worlds in order to obtain precious artifacts and DNA samples for their research. The Greedy Guns team is happy to work for HOLO CORP – as long as they pay well. And do they ever! Too bad HOLO CORP also sells them their guns.
